oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Practical small ruminant nutrition: Applied nutrition for veterinarians
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mongini, Andrea
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: small ruminant
goat
sheep
nutrition
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small ruminants have unique nutritional requirements that vary from cattle and other ruminant species. Sheep and goats also differ from one another in their nutritional requirements. This paper covers concepts related to basic applied nutrition for feeding goats and sheep. The nutrition recommendations covered are for practical use by veterinarians who aim to assist clients in creating feeding guidelines.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 56 (2023): 2023 Annual Conference Proceedings ; 167-170
